basics.name: Hugo Molle
basics.label: Embedded Software Engineer
basics.summary: Hugo Molle is a pragmatic professional who values clean, maintainable systems and enjoys exploring new technologies to solve problems efficiently. With a strong foundation in embedded systems and software development, he is passionate about creating innovative solutions that make a difference.

work.name: Pellenc SA
work.summary: Worked on the Pulve EOLE 2000/3000 project, adding radar height control sensing to improve spraying accuracy by up to 20%. Developed software for product recycle loops, reducing waste by up to 40%. Focused on non-regression tests, improving bug fix response time and documentation quality.
highlights: Added radar height control sensing for improved spraying accuracy (up to 20%)
Developed product recycle loop software, reducing waste by up to 40%
Implemented non-regression tests, improving bug fix response time
Enhanced documentation, increasing trust with field test technicians

work.name: Pellenc SA
work.summary: Designed and developed tools to reduce development and debugging time, including a real-time telemetry tool, an introspection tool for object classification algorithms, and a JSON configuration editor for embedded devices.
highlights: Developed a real-time telemetry tool to reduce development and debugging time
Created an introspection tool for visualizing object classification algorithms
Designed a user-friendly JSON configuration editor for embedded devices

education.institution: ESIMED (Ecole Superieure d'Informatique de la Mediterranee)
